html.body:
Instructions
What is this file? This file is used by Atlassian Cloud to verify ownership of your domain name.
Generated at 2024-07-05 18:00:18 UTC.
I have direct access to my web server
Upload this file to the root folder (top-level folder) of your domain's website.
The file must be accessible at: https://example.com/atlassian-domain-verification-99067484-6j24-1aj6-6k2d-d20d3c41k515.html
Return to Atlassian admin screen to complete the verification process
OR
I am using a CMS or other managed service
Create a page with the path: atlassian-domain-verification-99067484-6j24-1aj6-6k2d-d20d3c41k515.html
Insert this token somewhere into the page: 6aQD0KhL0CTkJfxIdw2uyu0WHg3P6D/y8Zg73nTiEh9WnzXMmr58oo9dCjLulSpk
For security reasons please ensure that only site administrators can edit or post comments to this page.
Return to Atlassian admin screen to complete the verification process
Troubleshooting
For further information please visit the
managed accounts and domain claim verification page.
A single redirect is allowed, to: https://www.example.com/atlassian-domain-verification-99067484-6j24-1aj6-6k2d-d20d3c41k515.html
Domain Verification Token This token must be found in the page at: https://example.com/atlassian-domain-verification-99067484-6j24-1aj6-6k2d-d20d3c41k515.html
6aQD0KhL0CTkJfxIdw2uyu0WHg3P6D/y8Zg73nTiEh9WnzXMmr58oo9dCjLulSpk
